request.description:
### Delete Books

This endpoint is used to delete one or more books from the admin panel.

#### Request Body

- raw (application/json)
    - ids (array): An array of book IDs to be deleted.
        

#### Response

The response for this request is a JSON schema. It will include the properties and data types for the response body, which will be useful for validating the response structure.
